scene_description: an astronaut discovering alien artifact on mars at sunset, dramatic cinematic lighting

structured_prompt.short_description: A 42-year-old male astronaut standing in awe, holding a metallic sample collection tool, with the setting sun of Mars casting a warm orange glow over his suit and an alien artifact at his feet, captured in a low-angle shot with a soft diffused rim light

objects.description: A 42-year-old male astronaut wearing a pristine white and grey spacesuit with a golden NASA emblem on the chest, the suit's fabric having a mix of matte and glossy textures, a hint of wear on the elbows and knees, standing tall with an athletic build and upright posture, his face partially hidden behind a reflective gold visor, short, dark brown hair visible at the nape of his neck, a sharp jawline and prominent nose, no facial hair, wearing a silver-toned watch on his left wrist, holding a metallic sample collection tool in his right hand and standing with his left hand resting on his hip, leaning forward slightly with his knees slightly bent as if in awe, oriented at a three-quarter turn to the camera
objects.shape_and_color: white, grey, gold, silver, dark brown
objects.appearance_details: pristine spacesuit, athletic build, upright posture, reflective gold visor, sharp jawline, prominent nose
objects.pose: standing with left hand on hip, leaning forward, knees slightly bent

structured_prompt.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, deformed, disfigured, bad anatomy, extra limbs, mutation

simple_prompt: A 42-year-old male astronaut standing in awe, holding a metallic sample collection tool, with the setting sun of Mars casting a warm orange glow over his suit and an alien artifact at his feet, captured in a low-angle shot with a soft diffused rim light
